non_compliances.title: Model monitoring dashboard not implemented in Phase 1
non_compliances.rationale: Phase 1 scope is limited to offline evaluation; live monitoring is planned for Phase 2 after pilot deployment.

risk_assessment.mitigation: Manual quarterly review by Data Science Lead and sign-off until dashboard is deployed.

non_compliances.sunset_condition: When model is used for regulated decisions or Phase 2 monitoring goes live.
